'''Armored Rose''' is [[Noelle]]'s Default [[Character Outfit]].

==Appearance==
<!-- Keep appearance section short and concise. Limit to 1-2 paragraphs (preferably 1 paragraph) with 3-4 sentences each. -->
Noelle has a maid-inspired dress with a metal headdress, a breastplate, a pauldron on her left shoulder, and a cravat. Her attire is adorned with fuchsia roses and bows. Her dress has one bow at her hip and a second at her rear, upon which her {{Geo}} [[Vision]] sits. She wears black tights beneath her armored boots.
